      • buildDateFromDateDialogToServerFormat

        public java.lang.String buildDateFromDateDialogToServerFormat(int year,
                                                              int month,
                                                              int dayOfMonth)
        Build Date in the server format (yyyy-MM-dd)
        Parameters:
        year - the selected year
        month - the selected month (0-11 for compatibility with Calendar.MONTH)
        dayOfMonth - th selected day of the month (1-31, depending on month)
        Returns:
        String date in the format (yyyy-MM-dd)

      • convertDateFromServerFormatToCalendar

        public java.util.Calendar convertDateFromServerFormatToCalendar(java.lang.String serverDate)
                                                         throws java.text.ParseException
        Convert Date from server format (yyyy-MM-dd) to Calendar
        Parameters:
        serverDate - Date from server
        Returns:
        Calendar with date from server
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
